description: Used CMake and the Project Chrono Library to develop a build system the simulation can be compiled withâ€‹
Wrote the simulation code for our specific setup, using the Chrono DEME demos as a basis for design
Integrated CAD models from our mechanical team to perform iterative, parameter-based, testing to optimize our design
Utilized Python libraries to post-process numerical simulation data and create visualizations for an intuitive 3D representation of the simulation
Worked with API's request handling and data exchange, gaining experience in designing and interacting with web services and external systems
Explored server-side rendering and dynamic routing in Next.js to enhance web application performance
Participated in asynchronous mock interviews, completing Python DSA questions and receiving feedback to refine my problem-solving skills
Developed strong communication and interpersonal skills, growing my clientele and reputation
Gained experience in multitasking and problem-solving under pressure, ensuring a smooth operations for several tables at a time
Received countless positive online reviews and seating requests from customers
